original_text: and the sons of Eliab were Nemuel, Dathan and Abiram. The same Dathan and Abiram were the community officials who rebelled against Moses and Aaron and were among Korah’s followers when they rebelled against the Lord.
korean_text: 엘리압의 아들은 느무엘과 다단과 아비람이라 이 다단과 아비람은 회중 가운데서 부름을 받은 자들이니 고라의 무리에 들어가서 모세와 아론을 거슬러 여호와께 반역할 때에

sentences.original_text: and the sons of Eliab were Nemuel, Dathan and Abiram.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 엘리압의 아들들은 느무엘, 다단과 아비람이었습니다.

sentences.original_text: The same Dathan and Abiram were the community officials
who rebelled against Moses and Aaron
when they rebelled against the Lord.
